mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (ISBN, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBLISH_DATE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, IMAGE) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publishDate}, #{description}, #{price}, #{image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR PUBLISHER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
